alert.note: Alert for Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 03 at 11:24AM CDT until April 03 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN HOUSTON COUNTY... At 1124 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Webb, or near Dothan, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Ashford around 1135 AM CDT. Columbia around 1150 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Barber, Pleasant Plains, Sigma, Pearce, Enon, Farley Nuclear Plant, Avon and Smyrna. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
